full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,ME MCHOD KYI CHO GA 'KHYER BDE BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005B (CES ME MCHOD BYA TSUL MDOR BSDUS BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR ZHES @006A *, ,BYA BA 'DI NI, RANG GI SLOB MA DPYOD LDAN DBU MDZAD DGE SLONG RDO RJE'I MING CAN GYI NAS PHYOGS 'DIR ME MCHOD KYI SROL KUN DAR YANG, MCHOD THABS YOD BRTAN RUNG BA ZHIG ME SNANG BAS KHUNGS LDAN 'KHYER BDE'I CHOG ZHIG MING KYANG DGOS ZHES NAN TAN DU BSKUL BA LTAR TSAD THUB KYI DAM PA SOGS GONG MA'I PHYAG SROL DANG, SGO BSTUN TE, ^DAM TSIG RDO RJE GA-YAR KHRAL TZAM DU BRIS PA 'DIS KYANG SKYE 'GRO MANG PO LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
